name: SoundsofHeavyRain
0:
”Alexa open Sounds of Heavy Rain”
”Alexa ask Sounds of Heavy Rain to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sounds of heavy rain
des:
Immerse yourself in the rhythmic and calming sounds of heavy rain. Ideal for sleep, focus, or relaxation, the steady downpour will create a soothing atmosphere, helping you to unwind and de-stress.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Sounds of Heavy Rain
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
